text: Aur musa (alh-e-salam) ki qom ney unn kay baad apney zewaron ka aik bachra mabood thehra liya jo kay aik qalib tha jiss mein aik aawaz thi. Kiya enhon ney yeh na dekha kay woh inn say baat nahi kerta tha aur na inn ko koi raah batlata tha uss ko enhon ney mabood qarar diya aur bari bey insafi ka kaam kiya
